div.p: Welcome to Willow Springs School District 108’s website. Willow Springs School serves students from Willow Springs and unincorporated Justice, Il in Chicago’s southwest suburbs. Our students enjoy a robust curriculum that prepares them for high school, college and the work force. Our students also enjoy a well-rounded curriculum that includes the arts and athletics.

div.h2: See What's Going On at Willow Springs School!
